title: Carol Ann Duffy
summary: Dame Carol Ann Duffy DBE FRSL HonFBA HonFRSE (born 23 December 1955) is a British[3] poet and playwright. She is a professor of contemporary poetry at Manchester Metropolitan University, and was appointed Poet Laureate in May 2009,[4] resigning in 2019. She is the first woman, the first Scottish-born poet and the first known LGBT poet to hold the position.[5]
